title: sparse
description: Sparse storage of attributes that deviate from their initialization value.

count.description: Number of entries stored in the sparse array.
count.gltf_detailedDescription: The number of attributes encoded in this sparse accessor.

indices.description: Index array of size `count` that points to those accessor attributes that deviate from their initialization value.

values.description: Array of size `count`, storing the displaced accessor attributes pointed by `indices`.
